1.0.0.name: wordpress/content-flow3d
1.0.0.description:
This a cool Wordpress 3D Image Rotator. Simple to use for presenting your produtcts or just a very nice image rotator. What you can do: - present a list of products - 3d image rotator - image gallery - content slider - and you'll find more . . .

Key Features:

  • Ajax image uploader
  • Content color picker
  • Full control of content size
  • auto-generated reflection
  • auto initialization
  • auto resize
  • circular flow (wrap around)
  • vertical flow
  • loading indicator
  • dynamic opacity
  • click to select control
  • mouse wheel control
  • keyboard control
  • drag 'n throw control
  • item as link
  • caption
  • 18 scrollbar colors

Notice:You need to have active fileinfo extension.(In php.ini replace ";extension=php_fileinfo.dll" with "extension=php_fileinfo.dll")
